docs.lead_paragraph: Some growing things indoors are a necessity for gardeners. A few potted plants are better than nothing. Next is a pleasant window garden, but best of all (when conservatories aren't possible) is a sunroom garden which can be started at any

headline.main: Sunroom Gardens Thrive On 15 Minutes a Day Care; GARDEN CHEER IN THE SUNROOM
